title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 09 July 2015 - XWiki

10:09 <vmassol> good morning everyone  
10:09 <vmassol> I think we should start stabilizing the build as much as possible today and fully focus on  it tomorrow  
10:10 <vmassol> mflorea: what's your ETA re Move/Update at API level?  
10:10 <vmassol> and test as much as possible our user stories  
10:13 <vmassol> FYI I've asked for new sonarqube plugin licenses this morning  
10:13 <vmassol> (this is why the sonar builds are failing on ci)  
10:14 <Trefex> has joined #xwiki  
10:19 <mflorea> vmassol: I need a few hours more, I should be able to finish today  
10:19 <vmassol> ok cool

17:00 <gdelhumeau> I handle http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-rest/lastBuild/testReport/  
17:36 <vmassol> guys  
17:36 <vmassol> seems we have a problem with maven 3.0.5 on jenkins  
17:36 <vmassol> http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform-7.1.x/56/consoleFull is failing because maven doesn't build the modules in the right ordre  
17:36 <vmassol> \*order  
17:36 <vmassol> url-scheme-filesystem is built after oldcore  
17:37 <vmassol> with maven 3.3.1 locally the order is correct and when I switched to maven 3.0.5 locally I was able to get the wrong order too  
17:37 <vmassol> so it seems there's a bug in 3.0.5 on the reactor ordering  
17:37 <vmassol> I wonder if we shouldn't try to upgrade to 3.3.3 on the agent  
17:38 <vmassol> does anyone any issue with 3.3.3 for us?
